Entries.companionAccepted: Sure! I've got time to spare.
Entries.companionAccepted_Dating: For you, I'd be glad to.
Entries.companionAccepted_Spouse: For you, my whole day's free.
Entries.companionRejected: My apologies, but I'll have to decline.
Entries.companionRejected_Dating: I apologize, but I'm quite busy today. Perhaps next time?
Entries.companionRejected_Spouse: I apologize, but I'm afraid I'm quite busy today, love.
Entries.companionRejectedNight: I'm afraid it's quite late for a stroll, isn't it?
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Dating: I apologize, but it's quite late for a stroll, isn't it?
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Spouse: I apologize, love. But I need to wake up early for tomorrow's endeavors.
Entries.companionDismiss: I had a splendid time. See you around!
Entries.companionDismiss_Dating: It was a splendid time around your company. See you around!
Entries.companionDismiss_Spouse: I had a splendid time with you, love. I'll see you around, then.
Entries.companionDismissAuto: I'm afraid I better get going. Goodbye!
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Dating: I'm afraid I have to head home now, @. Goodbye!
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Spouse: I'm afraid I'll be heading home earlier, love. I'll see you later! Take care!
Entries.companionRecruited: So what are the plans for today?
Entries.companionRecruited_Dating: So what are the date plans for today?
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse: Lead the way, love. I'll follow you anywhere.$h
Entries.farmerRunAway: Your pace is too fast! Slow down!
Entries.companion_Farm: Just from the view, I can see how good a quality your farm possesses. Good work, @.$h
Entries.companion_Farm~1: Do you have any helpers around, @?#$b#I can't imagine you running all this alone.#$b#Wait, what? You do!?$3
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy: The beauty of this valley is that pollution isn't as much of a problem.#$b#And so, being soaked under this rain doesn't feel as unsanitary than any the polluted cities I'm constantly visiting.
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy: With all this snow, the farm looks kind of bare.#$b#But at least you have your animals for another source of income, right?$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring: Flower related merchandise are usually a hit during this season.#$b#And so, it's usually a big focus of my aunt on her designs.#$b#But she once mentioned she grew to adore flowers because of your grandmother.#$b#I wonder how close they were before.
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer: I wonder if it's a good idea to invest in beachside resorts and amenities this season.#$b#I'll be contacting the investment management department about this later.
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall: Grandmother seems to find solace in this season, or at least it's what she once mentioned to me before.#$b#Apparently she has fond memories of this season from her childhood.#$b#She never disclosed what memories though.
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter: Besides animals, what would be your other sources of income during this season?#$b#I bet farmers are always resourceful enough to find alternative work in the meantime, right?
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating: If you ever need some assistance on the farm, don't hesitate to tell me, okay?#$b#I can always hire workers to work for you if the need ever rises.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating~1: Your honest hard work never goes by unseen, you know that?#$b#The valley deeply admires your work, @. You should be proud of that!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Dating: If you're ever sick from working under the rain, don't hesitate to contact me.#$b#I'll send for the best medical team there is to care for you! I'll be there too of course!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Dating: So what if... I buy you a personal snow plow?#$b#Oh wait! That sounds dangerous! Nevermind!$3
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: I would never be not impressed with the fruits of your labor, love.#$b#Your farm's success is evident in how pretty and functional it looks!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse~1: Your honest hard work never goes by unseen, you know that?#$b#The valley deeply admires your work, love. And I'm loudly proud of you for that!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Spouse: The rain's a nice help for watering crops, right?#$b#I'm fascinated on how farmers use the elements to their advantage.
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Spouse~1: If you're ever sick from working under the rain, don't hesitate to contact me.#$b#I'll send for the best medical team there is to care for you! I'll be there too of course!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Spouse: So what if... I buy you a personal snow plow operated by a professional?#$b#Ah! Wait! I don't think we have room to park that here though.$s
Entries.companion_Town: Small and quiet towns like this is a nice break from all the busy cities I've been to lately.#$b#I'm glad we have our home here.$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: If we have time, we should pay a visit to Grandmother and the family.#$b#Grandmother has been asking how you've been by the way.#$b#I think she likes you!$h

Louie said that this place is boring or needs something new.#$b#I believe that he's wrong though, and that he just hadn't put the time in to actually appreciate this village.#$b#My late Grandfather was a silent man, but he deeply appreciated nature and the sights around this village.#$b#So I'm thankful to him for the influence he instilled to me.$h
